description:
Join us for our annual - no frills - New Year's Eve party as we ring in the new year!
We are doing what we do best - sit back, relax and drink some damn fine beer. 

Our featured beers 6 IPAs will be on tap all night long!
*Sacred Cow
*Big Hair
*Dry-hopped Big Hair
*Ringing Saw
*Buzz Saw
*Mr. Delicious

Food specials are available but not mandatory and of course there is no cover.
name: Brew Year's Eve

description:
Save these dates to head over to beautiful Buhr Park (unless noted otherwise) and see fast paced, full contact roller derby action from your local league, Ann Arbor Derby Dimes!

May 14 - June 11 - July 9 - August 6

BUY 2016 SEASON PASSES: http://bpt.me/2537986

July 9
Arbor Bruising Co. vs Border City Brawlers: All-Stars
Ypsilanti Vigilantes vs Border City Brawlers: Canadian Clubbers
RSVP on FB: http://bit.ly/29dSJv0
BUY JULY 9 TICKETS: http://bpt.me/2539693

August 6
Arbor Bruising Co. vs Flint City Derby Girls
Ypsilanti Vigilantes vs Killamazoo Derby Darlins: Kill Squad
BUY AUGUST 6 TICKETS: http://bpt.me/2539697

For more information, see our 2016 season schedule: http://a2derbydimes.org/2016-schedule

______________________________________________


Previously this season:

May 14
Brawlstars vs The Chicago Outfit: Syndicate
Ypsilanti Vigilantes vs East Lansing Roller Derby: Broadbarians
RSVP on FB: http://bit.ly/1reSK5y
BUY MAY 14 TICKETS: http://bpt.me/2537998

June 11
Brawlstars vs North Star Roller Girls: Supernovas
Arbor Bruising Co. vs North Star Roller Girls: Northern Lights
RSVP on FB: http://bit.ly/29dSikp
BUY JUNE 11 TICKETS: http://bpt.me/2538000
name: Ann Arbor Derby Dimes 2016 season

description:
Join us for a very special evening to commemorate the coming of the new year! We'll have amazing Chef's Dinner Specials, Drink Specials, and a Champagne Toast at Midnight to ring in the new year in style =)

THE MENU
OYSTERS     MP
Chef Selection, two varieties, Atlantic and Pacific species

FILET MIGNON     $32
crispy fingerling potatoes, glazed heirloom carrots, demi glace     

SEARED SCALLOPS     $29
potato leek puree, caramelized brussels sprouts, bacon vinaigrette, champagne beurre blanc

DUCK BREAST     $25
sausage and sage apple stuffing, brown butter, sauteed green beans, toasted almonds, duck gravy

DRINK MENU
TIME FOR A CHANGE      $11
bols genever, absinthe, st germain, lemon, angostura bitters

SUN ON THE HORIZON      $12
mezcal, lagavulin 16, drambuie, lemon

BUBBLIN' WITH POM-FIDENCE    $11
pama liqueur, pomegranate juice, bubbles
name: Sava's New Years Eve 2017

description:
Join us at Aventura on Saturday, December 31st to ring in the new year in style!

Please note: No refunds 48 Hours in advance of this event. 

NYE Party | 10pm – 2am | $30
• Live DJ & Dancing w/ DJ LUKE FRUTIG
• Moët & Chandon Champagne Toast at Midnight
• Passed hors d'oeuvres
• Moët & Chandon Champagne & Dessert Station
• Balloon drop at midnight
• Selfie Station with NYE swag. 
• Moët & Chandon Raffle

NYE Dinner & Party | Reserve between 5pm–8pm |  $75
 • 4-course tasting menu exclusively created for New Year's Eve
• Moët & Chandon Champagne toast at midnight
• Live DJ & Dancing
• Moët & Chandon Champagne toast at midnight
• Passed hors d'oeuvres
• Moët & Chandon Champagne & Dessert Station
• Balloon Drop at Midnight
• Selfie Station with NYE swag. 
• Moët & Chandon Raffle

AVENTURA NEW YEAR’S EVE MENU

5 course dinner $75

______________________________________________________________________


1 – PINTXO

FOIE MICUIT & PIQUILLO PINTXO
foie gras de canard on tosta bread with piquillo pepper compote


2 – IBÉRICOS FROM ESPAÑA

SURTIDO DE IBÉRICO Y QUESOS
a selection of the best ibérico cold cuts from black footed free-range acorn-fed iberian pigs and the most renowned spanish cheeses.



3 – SEAFOOD FESTIVAL

CEVICHE & CAVIAR COCKTAIL
romaine lettuce with shrimp, octopus & scallops with a pink tartar dressing and cava


4 – MAINS

ASADO DE CORDERO
lamb shanks baked with roasted carrots and broccoli pure


5 – DESSERT

CHURROS & TURRON
aventura’s famous churros served with a selection of turrons– the spanish nougat


ENJOY NOCHEVIEJA (New years eve) SPANISH STYLE
12 grapes at 12.00am ( each per bell ring ) with a glass of Cava


NEW YEAR EVE VEGETARIAN MENU

5 course dinner $75

______________________________________________________________________


1– PINTXO

ALMENDRAS Y PIÑA
toasted almonds, goat cheese, thyme and candied pineapple


2 – CRUDOS

PIPIRRANA ANDALUZA SOBRE HUMUS DE TRUFA
typical spanish salad from andalusia, tomatoes, spring onion, cucumber, green pepper and garlic over white truffle hummus.


3 – VEGETABLES FROM ESPAÑA

ESCALIVADA CATALANA
traditional dish from catalonia of smoky roasted vegetables, eggplant, onion, garlic and bell peppers with extra virgin olive oil


4 – MAIN

VEGGIE NAPOLEON
roasted eggplant, zucchini, onion and tomato layered with thyme béchamel and mint leaves


5 – DESSERT

CHURROS & TURRON
aventura’s famous churros served with a selection of turrons– the spanish nougat

ENJOY NOCHEVIEJA (New Year’s Eve) SPANISH STYLE

12 grapes at 12.00am ( each per bell ring ) with a glass of Cava
name: Aventura New Year's Eve Dinner & Party 2017

description: It's never too early to make reservations for New Year's Eve! Plan to spend the celebration into 2017 with us, enjoying a prix fixe menu designed by our amazing Chef Adam. Call 734.222.9841 for reservations ~ $10 discount for reservations before 5:45pm.
name: New Year's Eve at Vinology

description:
Ring in the new year with a tricked out night of food, festivities and loads of fly music...

with special guests

Stormy Chromer [ball drop set]
Tetra
Chirp
cig butts
Bass WHLF Collective [spinning the afterhours party until 4am]
with Hans Play, Cass Wasacz, CHöFF music, KNGHT, Jake Spencer (Renraku Global Media)

$7 before 9pm, $10 after | $5 after 2am | 18 and up welcome

Club Above
215 N Main Street
Downtown Ann Arbor
[above the Heidelberg Restaurant]
name: NYE Gala w/ Stormy Chromer, Tetra, Chirp, Cig Butts & Bass WHLF

description:
Ring in the New Year with your favorite southeast Michigan nightclub... Necto! 

• PARTY. Celebration includes balloon drop at midnight, NYE party favors, photos & delicious midnight snacks including pizza.

• MUSIC. Join DJ Hardy, Nick Donovan & MC Yoda on the main floor spinning Top 40 & House. Ayinde Audio in the Red Room playing the best music from the late 80's, 90's & early 2000s. 

• TICKETS. General admission, as well as exclusive deals, available online now! Ticket link: NectoNYE2017.eventbrite.com.

• VIP. Tables are available for 21+ only. VIP includes express entry with line skip, seating, bottle service, champagne, and more. Available at ticket link above.

Get social:
necto.com
facebook.com/NectoNightclub
twitter.com/Necto
instagram.com/nectonightclub
name: New Year's Eve 2017 at Necto

description:
Saturday, Dec. 31 2016 | 18+ | 9:30pm | $10 Cover

2016, BYE
Celebrate another successful trip around the sun with a dance party inspired by the center of the universe herself...Beyonce!

#BeyBall Featuring
DJ Graffiti
Dante LaSalle
&  A live Beyoncé set from Detroit's own Britney Stoney!

Tix: https://goo.gl/bR6dNi
name: Bey Ball - NYE Dance Party at the Blind Pig - Ann Arbor

description: Come join us for the best NYE party in town! Presale tickets available now. VIP tables selling fast so act now!
